00019 #include "graphpainter.h"

00025 
00026 typedef QForm<QDialog, Ui_DlgGraphSetup> DlgGraphSetup;
00027 
00028 XQGraph::XQGraph( QWidget* parent, Qt::WFlags fl ) :
00029     QGLWidget( QGLFormat(QGL::AlphaChannel | QGL::DoubleBuffer | QGL::Rgba | QGL::DepthBuffer | QGL::AccumBuffer )
00030                , parent, 0, fl)
00031 {
00032     if(!format().directRendering()) dbgPrint("direct rendering disabled");
00033 //      if(!layout() ) new QHBoxLayout(this);
00034 //      layout()->setAutoAdd(true);
00035 }
00036 XQGraph::~XQGraph()
00037 {
00038     m_painter.reset();
00039 }
00040 void
00041 XQGraph::setGraph(const shared_ptr<XGraph> &graph)
00042 {
00043     m_conDialog.reset();
00044     m_painter.reset();
00045     m_graph = graph;
00046     if(graph && !isHidden()) {
00047         showEvent(NULL);
00048     } 
00049 }
00050 void
00051 XQGraph::mousePressEvent ( QMouseEvent* e)
00052 {
00053     if(!m_painter ) return;
00054     XQGraphPainter::SelectionMode mode;
00055     switch (e->button()) {
00056     case Qt::RightButton:
00057         mode = XQGraphPainter::SelAxis;
00058         break;
00059     case Qt::LeftButton:
00060         mode = XQGraphPainter::SelPlane;
00061         break;
00062     case Qt::MidButton:
00063         mode = XQGraphPainter::TiltTracking;
00064         break;
00065     default:
00066         mode = XQGraphPainter::SelNone;
00067         break;
00068     }
00069     m_painter->selectObjs(e->pos().x(), e->pos().y(), XQGraphPainter::SelStart, mode);
00070 }
00071 void
00072 XQGraph::mouseMoveEvent ( QMouseEvent* e)
00073 {
00074     static XTime lasttime = XTime::now();
00075     if(XTime::now() - lasttime < 0.033) return;
00076     if(!m_painter ) return;
00077     m_painter->selectObjs(e->pos().x(), e->pos().y(), XQGraphPainter::Selecting);  
00078 }
00079 void
00080 XQGraph::mouseReleaseEvent ( QMouseEvent* e)
00081 {
00082     if(!m_painter ) return;
00083     m_painter->selectObjs(e->pos().x(), e->pos().y(), XQGraphPainter::SelFinish);
00084 }
00085 void
00086 XQGraph::mouseDoubleClickEvent ( QMouseEvent* e)
00087 {
00088     e->accept();
00089     if(!m_painter ) return;
00090     if(m_graph) { 
00091         switch (e->button()) {
00092         case Qt::RightButton:
00093             m_painter->showHelp();
00094             break;
00095         case Qt::LeftButton:
00096             m_conDialog = xqcon_create<XQGraphDialogConnector>(m_graph,
00097                                                                new DlgGraphSetup(this, Qt::WDestructiveClose));
00098             break;
00099         case Qt::MidButton:
00100             break;
00101         default:
00102             break;
00103         }
00104     }
00105 }
00106 void
00107 XQGraph::wheelEvent ( QWheelEvent *e)
00108 {
00109     e->accept();
00110     if(m_painter )
00111         m_painter->wheel(e->pos().x(), e->pos().y(), (double)e->delta() / 8.0);
00112 }
00113 void
00114 XQGraph::showEvent ( QShowEvent * )
00115 {
00116     shared_ptr<XGraph> graph = m_graph;
00117     if(graph) { 
00118         m_painter.reset();
00119         // m_painter will be re-set in the constructor.
00120         new XQGraphPainter(graph, this);
00121         glInit();
00122         setMouseTracking(true);
00123     }
00124 }
00125 void
00126 XQGraph::hideEvent ( QHideEvent * )
00127 {
00128     m_conDialog.reset();
00129     m_painter.reset();
00130     setMouseTracking(false);
00131 }
00132 //! openGL stuff
00133 void
00134 XQGraph::initializeGL ()
00135 {
00136     glClearColor( 1.0, 1.0, 1.0, 1.0 );
00137     glClearDepth( 1.0 );
00138     if(m_painter )
00139         m_painter->initializeGL();
00140 }
00141 void
00142 XQGraph::resizeGL ( int width, int height )
00143 {
00144     glMatrixMode(GL_PROJECTION);
00145     glViewport( 0, 0, (GLint)width, (GLint)height ); 
00146     if(m_painter )
00147         m_painter->resizeGL(width, height);
00148 }
00149 void
00150 XQGraph::paintGL ()
00151 {
00152     if(m_painter )
00153         m_painter->paintGL();
00154     glEnd();
00155 }
